name: Generic Bullet Hell
description:
Use arrow keys to play. If your browser scrolls for some reason, I suggest switching to full-screen.

A little short on time due to work and with a whole load of CMake + Raylib + Emscripten problems. Nonetheless, wanted to make a bullet hell from scratch from start to finish and I did that while working usually 0AM-3AM every second day. It is limited, but complete. The resulting code is quite nice and I consider building something solid on it (although the CMake + Raylib + Emscripten combo really made me furious at some times, heh). At this stage it is more of a programming project than a game-dev one.

The only stage is around a minute long, so I hope you try it out and enjoy, cheers! Please share your score if you do!

The source code will be released soon.
